q1.auction

Class Auction

  • java.lang.Object
    • q1.auction.Auction

  • public class Auction
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manage an auction Accepts bids Runs auction Creates collection winning bids Reports on status particular bid
    Version:
    07.3.2016
    Author:
    jf

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) boolean biddingOpen
      Flag that indicates if the auction is open for bidding or not
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.ArrayList<Bid>> bids
      Map of lists of bids.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Bid> winningBids
      A list of winning bids

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Auction(Catalogue catalogue)
      Creates a new auction from the catalogue

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeBidding()
      Closes bidding - no further bids accepted
      private java.lang.String detailsWinningBids()
      Helper method for toString method.
      void holdAuction()
      The auction comprises a check on all bids Winning bid is second highest for each lot Traverse map of bids Sort each array list of bids (corresponding to each lot) And sell to second highest bid
      void openBidding()
      Allows bidding
      boolean status(int lotId, Person person)
      Checks if a particular person won the auction for particular lot Traverse all winning bids Search for match of lotId and person in each element of winning bids list
      boolean submitBid(Bid bid)
      Submit a bid The method adds the bid to the map of bids The map key is the number of the lot being bid for The corresponding map value is the array list of bids associated with that key
      java.lang.String toString()
      Constructs string representation of object

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • bids

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.ArrayList<Bid>> bids
        Map of lists of bids. A list of bids exists for each lot. Map key is the lotId integer value in Integer wrapper. Value is the arraylist of bids for a specific lot

      • winningBids

        private java.util.ArrayList<Bid> winningBids
        A list of winning bids

      • biddingOpen

        boolean biddingOpen
        Flag that indicates if the auction is open for bidding or not

    • Constructor Detail

      • Auction

        public Auction(Catalogue catalogue)
        Creates a new auction from the catalogue
        Parameters:
        catalogue - the catalogue used to create the auction

    • Method Detail

      • openBidding

        public void openBidding()
        Allows bidding

      • closeBidding

        public void closeBidding()
        Closes bidding - no further bids accepted

      • holdAuction

        public void holdAuction()
        The auction comprises a check on all bids Winning bid is second highest for each lot Traverse map of bids Sort each array list of bids (corresponding to each lot) And sell to second highest bid

      • submitBid

        public boolean submitBid(Bid bid)
        Submit a bid The method adds the bid to the map of bids The map key is the number of the lot being bid for The corresponding map value is the array list of bids associated with that key
        Parameters:
        bid - The bid being submitted
        Returns:
        true if the bid accepted else false

      • status

        public boolean status(int lotId,
             Person person)
        Checks if a particular person won the auction for particular lot Traverse all winning bids Search for match of lotId and person in each element of winning bids list
        Parameters:
        lotId - The id of the lot in question
        person - The person whose bid is being checked
        Returns:
        True if the person's bid successful else return false

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Constructs string representation of object
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string representation of this object

      • detailsWinningBids

        private java.lang.String detailsWinningBids()
        Helper method for toString method. Returns list detailing all winning bids
        Returns:
